## Checklist

**Code quality:**
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors

**Testing:**
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Backend tests pass (`mvn test`)
- [ ] Frontend builds successfully (`npm run build`)

**Documentation:**
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the API documentation (Swagger annotations)
- [ ] I have updated the README if needed

**Database:**
- [ ] Database migrations are backward compatible
- [ ] Migration has been tested locally
- [ ] Rollback strategy documented (if applicable)

**Security:**
- [ ] No sensitive data (passwords, API keys) in code
- [ ] Input validation added for new endpoints
- [ ] Authorization checks implemented for protected resources

**Performance:**
- [ ] Changes do not negatively impact performance
- [ ] Database queries are optimized (indexes added if needed)
- [ ] No N+1 query problems introduced
